class.name: Telerik.UI.Chart.RadarLineSeries
class.description: Creates an instance of a radar line series for RadChart.

constructor.description: Creates an instance of a radar line series for RadChart.

property.name: type
property.description: Gets the type of the series.

property.name: axis
property.description: Gets or sets the name of the value axis to use. Defaults to the primary axis.

property.name: dashType
property.description: Gets or sets the dash type of the line.

property.name: markers
property.description: Gets the marker settings for the line series.

property.name: style
property.description: Gets or sets the style of the line series. The step value is supported only when series.type is set to "line" or "area".

property.name: missingValues
property.description: Gets or sets the behavior for handling missing values in line series. Accepted values are: "gap" - the line stops before missing point and continues after it; "interpolate" - the value is interpolated from neighboring points; "zero" - the value is assumed to be zero. Default is "gap".

property.name: width
property.description: Gets or sets the line width for this series.

property.name: errorBars
property.description: The errorBars option is supported when series.type is set to "bar", "column", "line", "area", "scatter", "scatterLine" or "bubble".

property.description: Gets or sets the color with which this series is displayed on the plot area.

class.description: Creates an instance of a funnel series for RadChart

constructor.description: Creates an instance of a funnel series for RadChart

property.name: type
property.description: Gets the type of the series.

property.name: labels
property.description: Gets or sets the settings for the series data labels.

property.name: segmentSpacing
property.description: Gets or sets the space in pixels between the different segments of the funnel chart.

property.name: neckRatio
property.description: Gets or sets the neckRatio. neckRatio specifies the ratio top-base/bottom-base of the whole chart. neckRatio set to three means the top base is three times smaller than the bottom base.

property.name: dynamicSlope
property.description: Gets or sets the dynamicSlope. When set to true the ratio of the bases of each segment is calculated based on the ratio of currentDataItem.value/nextDataItem.value The last element is always created like a rectangle since there is no following element.

property.name: dynamicHeight
property.description: Gets or sets the dynamicHeight. When set to false all segments become with the same height, otherwise the height of each segment is based on its value.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Sparkline.Axis
class.description: Represents an axis on a chart.

constructor.description: Represents an axis on a chart.

property.name: narrowRange
property.description: Prevents the automatic axis range from snapping to 0.

property.name: majorGridLines
property.description: Gets the major grid line settings.

property.name: crosshair
property.description: Gets the axis crosshair settings.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of this axis.

property.name: axisCrossingValue
property.description: Gets or sets the value at which this axis crosses the perpendicular axis.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the color to all apply to all axis elements. Individual color settings for line and labels take priority. Any valid CSS color is accepted.

property.name: labels
property.description: Gets the axis label settings.

property.name: line
property.description: Gets the axis line settings.

property.name: minorGridLines
property.description: Gets the minor grid line settings.

property.name: majorTicks
property.description: Gets the major tick settings

property.name: minorTicks
property.description: Gets the minor tick settings

property.name: min
property.description: Gets or sets the minimum value of the axis. This property is often used in combination with the max property to adjust the size of the chart relative to the charting area.

property.name: max
property.description: Gets or sets the maximum value of the axis. This property is often used in combination with the min property to adjust the size of the chart relative to the charting area.

property.name: majorUnit
property.description: Gets or sets the interval between major divisions. For example, on a column chart, this property determines the step size whole going up the vertical axis. You can additionally have minor steps and ticks in between the major ones by adjusting the minorUnit and minorTick.size properties.

property.name: minorUnit
property.description: Gets or sets the interval between minor divisions. For more information, refer to the majorUnit property description.

property.name: name
property.description: Gets or sets the unique axis name.

property.name: plotBands
property.description: Gets or sets the plot bands of the axis. Elements of this array must be objects of the form { from:0, to: 100, color: 'navy' }

property.name: reverse
property.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the axis direction is reversed.

property.name: title
property.description: Retrieves the chart axis title settings.

property.name: baseUnit
property.description: Gets or sets the base time interval for the axis when axis values are of Date type. Accepted values are "seconds", "minutes", "hours", "days", "weeks", "months" and "years". The default value is determined automatically from the minimum difference between subsequent categories.

property.name: notes
property.description: Retrieves the chart axis notes settings.

property.name: missingValues
property.description: Gets or sets the behavior for handling missing values in line series. Accepted values are: "gap" - the line stops before missing point and continues after it; "interpolate" - the value is interpolated from neighboring points; "zero" - the value is assumed to be zero. Default is "gap".

class.name: Telerik.UI.Sparkline._AxisLineConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart axis line.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart axis line.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the axis line.

property.name: width
property.description: Gets or sets the width of the axis line in pixels.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the color of the axis line. Any valid CSS color is accepted.

property.name: dashType
property.description: Gets or sets the dash type of the line.

property.name: type
property.description: Gets or sets the type of the grid lines for radar charts. This property has a meaning only when working with radar series. Defaults to 'line' for 'radarLine' and 'radarArea' series and 'arc' for 'radarColumn' series.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Sparkline._AxisTickConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart axis tick.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart axis tick.

property.name: size
property.description: Gets or sets the width of the axis tick lines in pixels.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the axis tick lines.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Sparkline._CrossHairTooltipConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a crosshair tooltip.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a crosshair tooltip.

property.name: padding
property.description: Gets or sets the padding of the tooltip.

property.name: background
property.description: Gets or sets the background color of the tooltip. The default value is determined from the series color.

property.name: border
property.description: Gets the tooltip border settings.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the text color of the tooltip. The default value is determined from the series label color.

property.name: font
property.description: Gets or sets the tooltip font.

property.name: format
property.description: Gets or sets the tooltip format. Format variables depend on the series type: Area, bar, column, funnel, line and pie 0 - value; Bubble, scatter and scatterLine 0 - x value, 1 - y value; Candlestick and OHLC 0 - open value, 1 - high value, 2 - low value, 3 - close value, 4 - category name; For Example: "{0:C}--{1:C}" to show a tooltip on candlestick series for open and high values.

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the template that is used to render the tooltip. Available template variables are value, category, series and dataItem.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the tooltip visibility. Default is false.

property.name: shared
property.description: A value indicating if the tooltip should be shared. Default is false.

property.name: sharedTemplate
property.description: The shared tooltip template. Template variables: points - the category points, category - the category name

class.name: Telerik.UI.Sparkline._AxisCrossHairConfiguration

property.description: Gets or sets the id of the crosshair. If not set, it will be autogenerated.

property.description: Gets or sets the color of the crosshair. Any valid CSS color is accepted.

property.name: width
property.description: Gets or sets the width of the crosshair in pixels.

property.name: zIndex
property.description: Gets or sets the zIndex of the crosshair.

property.name: opacity
property.description: Gets or sets the crosshair opacity.

property.name: dashType
property.description: Gets or sets the dash type of the crosshair.

property.name: tooltip
property.description: Retrieves the tooltip settings for this crosshair.

property.name: mirror
property.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the labels and ticks are mirrored. Mirrored labels usually rendered on the left side will be rendered on the right.

property.name: rotation
property.description: Gets or sets the rotation angle of the labels.

property.name: skip
property.description: Gets or sets the number of labels from the beginning of the axis to skip rendering.

property.name: step
property.description: Gets or sets the label rendering step. Every n-th label is rendered, where n is the step value.

property.name: dateFormats
property.description: Gets the date formatting settings for the axis labels when the axis values are of Date type.

property.name: background
property.description: Gets or sets the background color of the labels. Any valid CSS color is accepted.

property.name: border
property.description: Gets the border settings of the labels.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the text color of the labels. Any valid CSS color is accepted.

property.name: culture
property.description: Gets or sets the culture of the labels.

property.name: font
property.description: Gets or sets the font style of the labels.

property.name: format
property.description: Gets or sets the format of the labels.

property.name: margin
property.description: Gets the margin settings of the labels.

property.name: padding
property.description: Gets the padding settings of the labels.

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the label template. Inside the template, the 'value' variable exposes the label value.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the labels.

property.name: position
property.description: Gets or sets the position of the labels.

property.description: Gets or sets the text color of the label. Any valid CSS color value is accepted.

property.description: Gets or sets the label font style.

property.description: Gets or sets the label template. Inside the template, the following variables can be used: category - the category name. (only for donut and pie charts); percentage - the point value represented as a percentage value. (only for donut, funnel and pie charts); dataItem - the original data item used to construct the point. (only for donut and pie charts)

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart title.

property.name: align
property.description: Gets or sets the chart title alignment. Accepted values are: "left", "center", "right". Default is "center"

property.name: background
property.description: Gets or sets the background color of the chart title.

property.name: border
property.description: Gets the border settings of the chart title.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the text color of the chart title.

property.name: font
property.description: Gets or sets the title font.

property.name: margin
property.description: Gets the margin settings of the chart title.

property.name: padding
property.description: Gets the padding settings of the chart title.

property.name: position
property.description: Gets or sets the vertical position of the chart title. Accepted values are: "top" and "bottom". Default is "top".

property.name: text
property.description: Gets or sets the title text.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the title visibility. Default is false.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Sparkline._TooltipConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart tooltip.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart tooltip.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the tooltip visibility. Default is true.

property.name: shared
property.description: A value indicating if the tooltip should be shared. Default is true.

property.name: background
property.description: Gets or sets the background color of the tooltip. The default value is determined from the series color.

property.name: border
property.description: Gets the tooltip border settings.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the text color of the tooltip. The default value is determined from the series label color.

property.name: font
property.description: Gets or sets the tooltip font.

property.name: format
property.description: Gets or sets the tooltip format. Format variables depend on the series type: Area, bar, column, funnel, line and pie 0 - value; Bubble, scatter and scatterLine 0 - x value, 1 - y value; Candlestick and OHLC 0 - open value, 1 - high value, 2 - low value, 3 - close value, 4 - category name; For Example: "{0:C}--{1:C}" to show a tooltip on candlestick series for open and high values.

property.name: padding
property.description: Gets the padding settings of the tooltip.

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the template that is used to render the tooltip. Available template variables are value, category, series and dataItem.

property.name: sharedTemplate
property.description: The shared tooltip template. Template variables: points - the category points, category - the category name

class.name: Telerik.UI.Grid.Column
class.description: A class representing a grid column.

constructor.description: A class representing a grid column.

property.name: attributes
property.description: Definition of column cells' HTML attributes. Reserved words in Javascript should be enclosed in quotation marks.

property.name: headerAttributes
property.description: Definition of column header cell's HTML attributes. Reserved words in Javascript should be enclosed in quotation marks.

property.name: footerAttributes
property.description: Definition of column footer cell's HTML attributes. Reserved words in Javascript should be enclosed in quotation marks.

property.name: aggregates
property.description: The aggregates to be used when grouping is applied.

property.name: command
property.description: Definition of command column. The supported built-in commands are: "create", "cancel", "save", "destroy". Accepts a string or an array of strings to specify multiple commands.

property.name: editor
property.description: Provides a way to specify custom editor for this column.

property.name: encoded
property.description: Specified whether the column content is escaped. Disable encoding if the data contains HTML markup.

property.name: field
property.description: The field from the datasource that will be displayed in the column.

property.name: filterable
property.description: Specifies filtering options for this column. This property is read-only, but accepts a boolean value indicating whether filtering is enabled for the column, providing a shortcut for filterable.enabled.

property.name: values
property.description: Gets or sets an array of values that will be displayed instead of the bound values. Each item in the array must have a text and a value field.

property.name: format
property.description: The format that will be applied on the column cells.

property.name: hidden
property.description: Specifies whether given column is hidden.

property.name: sortable
property.description: Specifies whether given column is sortable.

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the template for column's cells.

property.name: headerTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template for column's header cells.

property.name: footerTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template for column's footer cells.

property.name: groupHeaderTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template for column's group header cells.

property.name: groupFooterTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template for column's group footer cells.

property.name: title
property.description: The text that will be displayed in the column header.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the column.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Grid._ColumnFilterableConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the filtering properties in a grid.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the filtering properties in a grid.

property.name: enabled
property.description: Gets or sets whether editing is enabled in the grid. Default is false.

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the template rendered in the filter menu.

property.name: refresh
property.description: Gets or sets a function that will update the custom filter UI with values from the grid's filter expression. The function accepts two arguments - the HTML element that contains the rendered filter menu and a filter expressions object that contains the filter state of the grid.

property.name: apply
property.description: Gets or sets a function that will collect and return a filter expression from a custom filter UI. The functions accepts a single parameter - the HTML element that contains the rendered filter menu. The developer must collect filter data and return a filter expression object from the function.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Grid.EditableConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the editing properties in a grid.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the editing properties in a grid.

property.name: enabled
property.description: Gets or sets whether editing is enabled in the grid. Default is false.

property.name: destroy
property.description: Gets or sets whether items should be immediately deleted or only marked for deletion. Default is true.

property.name: mode
property.description: Gets or sets the editing mode. Accepted values are "cell", "cellBatch", and "row". Default is "cell".

property.name: createAt
property.description: Indicates whether the created record should be inserted at the top or at the bottom of the current page. Available values are "top" and "bottom". Default value is "top".

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the template for that will be used when editing in "popup" mode.

property.name: update
property.description: Gets or sets whether an item should be switched to edit mode on click. Default is true.

property.name: create
property.description: Gets or sets whether an the insert new item button is visible. Default is true.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Grid.TableView

property.name: owner

property.description: Gets or sets the options for the detail tables. All newly initialized detail tables will inherit these options automatically.

property.name: parentRelation
property.description: Gets the parent relations for this table as an object or an array of objects in the form: { masterField: 'field1', detailField: 'field2' }. To configure parent relations, set the detailTable.parentRelation property of the parent table.

property.name: autoBind
property.description: Indicates whether the grid will call read on the DataSource initially.

property.description: A collection of column objects or collection of strings that represents the name of the fields.

property.description: Gets or sets the data source object for this control.

property.name: detailTemplate

property.name: rowTemplate
property.description: Template to be used for rendering the rows.

property.name: altRowTemplate
property.description: Template to be used for rendering the alternating rows.

property.description: Sets the height of the grid.

property.name: groupable
property.description: Indicates whether grouping is enabled.

property.name: selectable
property.description: Indicates whether selection is enabled.

property.name: selection
property.description: Gets or sets selected rows/cells.

property.name: editable
property.description: Gets and sets the editing related (create/update/delete) options.

property.name: sortable
property.description: Indicates whether sorting is enabled.

property.name: resizable
property.description: Indicates whether column resizing is enabled/disable.

property.name: filterable
property.description: Indicates whether filtering is enabled/disabled.

property.name: reorderable
property.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether column reordering is enabled.

property.name: navigatable
property.description: Indicates whether keboard navigation is enabled/disabled.

property.name: messages
property.description: Gets the localization messages used by the control.

property.name: element
property.description: Gets the DOM element that hosts this control.

property.name: initialized
property.description: Indicates whether the control is initialized.

method.name: clearSelection
method.description: Clears currently selected items.

method.name: collapseGroup
method.description: Collapses specified group.

parameter.name: element
parameter.description: Target group item to collapse.

method.name: collapseRow
method.description: Collapses specified master row.

parameter.name: element
parameter.description: Target master row to collapse.

method.name: dataItem
method.description: Returns the data item to which a given table row (tr DOM element) is bound.

parameter.name: element
parameter.description: Target row.

method.name: expandGroup
method.description: Expands specified group.

parameter.name: element
parameter.description: Target group item to expand.

method.name: expandRow
method.description: Expands specified master row.

parameter.name: element
parameter.description: Target master row to expand.

method.name: hideColumn
method.description: Hides the specified column.

parameter.name: column
parameter.description: The index or the bound field of the column to hide.

method.name: refresh
method.description: Reloads the data and repaints the control.

method.name: reorderColumn
method.description: Changes the position of the specified column.

parameter.name: destIndex
parameter.description: Destination column index

parameter.name: column
parameter.description: Column index, DOM element or array element from columns option

method.name: showColumn
method.description: Shows the specified column.

parameter.name: column
parameter.description: The index or the bound field of the column to show.

method.name: editCell
method.description: Switches the specified table cell in edit mode. Requires editable: { mode: "cell" }.

parameter.name: cell
parameter.description: The cell to edit.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Scheduler.Resource
class.description: A class representing a scheduler resource.

constructor.description: A class representing a scheduler resource.

property.name: dataColorField
property.description: The field of the resource data item which contains the resource color.

property.name: dataSource
property.description: The data source which contains resource data items. Can be a JavaScript object which represents a valid data source configuration, a JavaScript array or an existing Telerik.Data.DataSource instance. If the dataSource option is set to a JavaScript object or array the widget will initialize a new Telerik.Data.DataSource instance using that value as data source configuration. If the dataSource option is an existing Telerik.Data.DataSource instance the widget will use that instance and will not initialize a new one.

property.name: dataTextField
property.description: The field of the resource data item which represents the resource text.

property.name: dataValueField
property.description: The field of the resource data item which represents the resource value. The resource value is used to link a scheduler event with a resource.

property.name: field
property.description: The field of the scheduler event which contains the resource id.

property.name: multiple
property.description: If set to true the scheduler event can be assigned multiple instances of the resource. The scheduler event field specified via the field option will contain an array of resources. By default only one resource instance can be assigned to an event.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the resource used to distinguish resource. If not set the value of the field option is used.

property.name: title
property.description: The user friendly title of the resource displayed in the scheduler edit form. If not set the value of the field option is used.

property.name: valuePrimitive
property.description: Set to false if the scheduler event field specified via the field option contains a resource data item. By default the scheduler expects that field to contain a primitive value (string, number) which corresponds to the "value" of the resource (specified via dataValueField).

class.name: Telerik.UI.Scheduler._GroupConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart title.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a chart title.

property.name: resources
property.description: An array of resource names by which the scheduler events will be grouped.

property.name: orientation
property.description: The orientation of the group headers. Supported values are "horizontal" or "vertical". Note that the agenda view is always in vertical orientation. Default value is "horizontal".

class.name: Telerik.UI.Scheduler._EditableConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the editing properties in a scheduler.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the editing properties in a scheduler.

property.name: enabled
property.description: If set to true the user would be able to create new scheduler events and modify or delete existing ones. Default is false.

property.name: create
property.description: If set to true the user can create new events. Default is true.

property.name: destroy
property.description: If set to true the user can delete events from the view by clicking the "destroy" button. Default is true.

property.name: resize
property.description: If set to true the scheduler allows event resizing. Dragging the resize handles changes the start or end time of the event. Default is true.

property.name: template
property.description: The template which renders the editor. The template should contain elements whose name HTML attributes are set as the editable fields. This is how the scheduler will know which field to update.

property.name: update
property.description: If set to true the user can update events. Default is true.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Scheduler.View
class.description: A class representing a scheduler view.

constructor.description: A class representing a scheduler view.

property.name: allDayEventTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template to be used to render the "all day" scheduler events. The fields which can be used in the template are: description [String] - the event description; end [Date] - the event end date; resources [Array] - the event resources; start [Date] - the event start date; title [String] - the event title

property.name: allDaySlot
property.description: If set to true the scheduler will display a slot for "all day" events.

property.name: dateHeaderTemplate
property.description: The template used to render the date header cells. By default the scheduler renders the date using the current culture date format. The fields which can be used in the template are: date [Date] - represents the major tick date.

property.name: dayTemplate
property.description: The template used to render the day slots in month view. The dayTemplate option is only supported when views.type is set to "month". The fields which can be used in the template are: date [Date] - represents the current day.

property.name: editable
property.description: Sets whether the user would be able to create new scheduler events and modify or delete existing ones. Overrides the editable option of the scheduler.

property.name: endTime
property.description: The end time of the view. The scheduler will display events ending before the endTime.

property.name: eventDateTemplate
property.description: The template used by the agenda view to render the date of the scheduler events. The fields which can be used in the template are: date [Date] - represents the event date.

property.name: eventHeight
property.description: The height of the scheduler event rendered in month view.

property.name: eventTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template to be used to render the scheduler events. The fields which can be used in the template are: description [String] - the event description; end [Date] - the event end date; resources [Array] - the event resources; start [Date] - the event start date; title [String] - the event title

property.name: eventTimeTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template to be used to render the agenda view scheduler events. The eventTimeTemplate option is onlt supported when views.type is set to "agenda". The fields which can be used in the template are: description [String] - the event description; end [Date] - the event end date; isAllDay [Boolean] - if true the event is "all day"; resources [Array] - the event resources; start [Date] - the event start date; title [String] - the event title

property.name: majorTick
property.description: The number of minutes represented by a major tick. The majorTick option is supported only when views.type is set to "day" or "week".

property.name: majorTimeHeaderTemplate
property.description: The template used to render the major ticks. The majorTimeHeaderTemplate option is supported when views.type is set to "day" or "week". By default the scheduler renders the time using the current culture date format. The fields which can be used in the template are: date [Date] - represents the major tick date.

property.name: minorTickCount
property.description: The number of time slots to display per major tick. The minorTickCount option is supported when views.type is set to "day" or "week".

property.name: minorTimeHeaderTemplate
property.description: The template used to render the minor ticks. The minorTimeHeaderTemplate option is supported when views.type is set to "day" or "week". By default the scheduler renders a space " ". The fields which can be used in the template are: date [Date] - represents the major tick date.

property.name: selected
property.description: If set to true the view will be initially selected by the scheduler widget. If more than one view is selected then the last one will be used.

property.name: selectedDateFormat
property.description: The format used to display the selected date. Contains two placeholders - "{0}" and "{1}" which represent the start and end date displayed by the view.

property.name: startTime
property.description: The start time of the view. The scheduler will display events starting after the startTime.

property.name: type
property.description: The type of the view. The built-in views are: "day", "week", "month" and "agenda".

class.name: Telerik.UI.Calendar._MonthConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the Calendar month object.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the Calendar month object.

property.name: template
property.description: Template to be used for rendering the cells in the 'month' view, which are in range. Default value is "".

property.name: disabledTemplate
property.description: Template to be used for rendering the cells in the 'month' view, which are not in the min/max range. Default value is "".

class.name: Telerik.UI.Calendar._FooterConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the Calendar footer object.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the Calendar footer object.

property.name: template
property.description: Template to be used for rendering the footer. Default value is "".

property.name: enabled
property.description: If false, the footer will not be rendered. Default value is true.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Calendar._SelectionConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the Calendar month object.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the Calendar month object.

property.name: mode
property.description: Gets or sets the selection mode of the control.

property.name: singleRange
property.description: Configures the type of the 'singleRange' selection mode of the control. If the endCalendar sub-property is set to a selector that matches another RadCalendar on the same page, both calendars will work together to allow the user to select a single date range only by tapping/clicking.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Common._BorderConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a border.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a border.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the color of the border/line.

property.name: dashType
property.description: Gets or sets the dash type of the border/line. Accepted valies are: "solid", "dot", "dash", "longDash", "dashDot", "longDashDot", "longDashDotDot"

property.name: width
property.description: Gets or sets the width of the border/line in pixels.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Common._BoxConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a bounding box such as padding or margin.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of a bounding box such as padding or margin.

property.name: left
property.description: Gets or sets the left value.

property.name: right
property.description: Gets or sets the right value.

property.name: top
property.description: Gets or sets the top value.

property.name: bottom
property.description: Gets or sets the bottom value.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Gauge._LabelConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the gauge labels.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the gauge labels.

property.name: background
property.description: Gets or sets the background of the gauge labels. Any valid CSS color string is accepted.

property.name: border
property.description: Gets the border settings of the gauge labels.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the text color of the gauge labels. Any valid CSS color string is accepted.

property.name: font
property.description: Gets or sets the font style of the gauge labels.

property.name: format
property.description: Gets or sets the format of the gauge labels.

property.name: margin
property.description: Retrieves the margin settings of the gauge labels.

property.name: padding
property.description: Retrieves the padding settings of the gauge labels.

property.name: position
property.description: Gets or sets the labels position. Valid values are "inside" and "outside". Default value is "outside".

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the template of the gauge labels.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the gauge labels. Default value is true.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Gauge._TickConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the gauge ticks.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the gauge ticks.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the color of the ticks. Any valid CSS color string is accepted.

property.name: size
property.description: Gets or sets the tick length in pixels.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the ticks. Default is true.

property.name: width
property.description: Gets or sets the width of the ticks in pixels. Default is 0.5

class.name: Telerik.UI.Gauge._RadialPointerConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the radial gauge pointer.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the radial gauge pointer.

property.name: capSize
property.description: Gets or sets the size of the value in percents (from 0 to 1).

property.name: capColor
property.description: Gets or sets the color of the pointer cap. Any valid CSS color string is accepted.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the color of the pointer. Any valid CSS color string is accepted.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Gauge._LinearPointerTrackConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the linear pointer track.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the linear pointer track.

property.name: border
property.description: Gets the border settings for the gauge pointer track.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the color of the pointer track. Any valid CSS color string is accepted.

property.name: opacity
property.description: Gets or sets the opacity of the pointer track.

property.name: size
property.description: Gets or sets the size of the pointer track.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the pointer track.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Gauge._LinearPointerConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the linear gauge pointer.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the linear gauge pointer.

property.name: border
property.description: Gets the border settings for the gauge pointer.

property.name: color
property.description: Gets or sets the color of pointer. Any valid CSS color string is accepted.

property.name: margin
property.description: Gets the margin settings of the pointer.

property.name: opacity
property.description: Gets or sets the opacity of the pointer. Default value is 1.

property.name: shape
property.description: Gets or sets the shape of the pointer. Possible values are "barIndicator" and "arrow". Default is "barIndicator."

property.name: size
property.description: Gets or sets the size of the pointer.

property.name: track
property.description: Retrieves the settings for the pointer track.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Gauge._LineConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the linear gauge scale line.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the linear gauge scale line.

property.name: visible
property.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the gauge scale line. Default value is true.

class.name: Telerik.UI.Slider._TooltipConfiguration
class.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the slider tooltip.

constructor.description: For internal usage only. Describes the properties of the slider tooltip.

property.name: enabled
property.description: Gets or sets the enabled state of the slider tooltip.

property.name: format
property.description: Gets or sets the format of the slider tooltip. If a tooltip template is set, the value of this property will be ignored and the template will be used instead.

property.name: template
property.description: Gets or sets the template string that will be used for the content of the slider tooltip. A non-empty value for this property overrides the tooltip format when the tooltip is shown.
